name: nomnoml
description: The sassy UML renderer that generates diagrams from text
author: Daniel Kallin <daniel.kallin@gmail.com>

scripts.prepare: npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run test && npm run test_cli && npm run minify && npm run webapp
scripts.build: cd src && tsc && npm run bundle
scripts.webapp: node build/build-icons.js && ( cd webapp && tsc ) && cd .. && uglifyjs dist/webapp.js -o dist/webapp.js
